mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_RECEPTION ( PATIENT_UUID, DOCTOR_UUID, NAME, RRN, SYMPTOM, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{patientUuid}, #{doctorUuid}, #{patientName}, #{rrn}, #{symptom}, #{dateTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT UUID, PATIENT_UUID, DOCTOR_UUID, NAME, STATUS, TURN FROM TB_RECEPTION WHERE DOCTOR_UUID = #{doctorUuid} AND STATUS IN ('RE01', 'RE03') -- 오늘 날짜만 조회하기 위해 설정했지만 테스트위해 일단 생략 -- AND -- CREATE_DATE BETWEEN CURDATE() AND CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 DAY ORDER BY TURN;
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_RECEPTION SET STATUS = #{updateStatus, typeHandler=com.emr.slgi.reception.typehandler.ReceptionStatusTypeHandler}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE UUID = #{uuid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_RECEPTION (PATIENT_UUID, DOCTOR_UUID, SYMPTOM) SELECT PATIENT_UUID, DOCTOR_UUID, SYMPTOM FROM TB_RESERVATION WHERE UUID = #{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(STATUS) FROM TB_RECEPTION WHERE STATUS = 'RE03' AND DOCTOR_UUID = #{doctorUuid}
